contents.name: ValueMetadataId
contents.comment: Represents the global unique id of a stream.

contents.name: MerkleTreeDepth
contents.description: Depth of the merkle-tree for proofs.
contents.comment: Proofs allows to verify integrity and origin of the stream. A proof represents a binary-merkle-tree and 2^MerkleTreeDepth values are necessary to build a single proof.

contents.name: MerkleTreeTimeout
contents.description: Timeout for a single merkle-tree for proofs.
contents.comment: If a stream doesn't provides enought values to build an entire merkle tree with the given depth in the given period it will be splitted into smaller merkle-trees.

contents.name: SubmissionInterval
contents.description: Timeout for a single merkle-tree for proofs.
contents.comment: If a stream doesn't provides enought values to build an entire merkle tree with the given depth in the given period it will be splitted into smaller merkle-trees.
